const string _pathName

Detailed Description

A class responsible for inter-process communication. Fifo (named pipe) is system-persistent and exists beyond the life of the process and must be deleted once it is no longer being used.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Fifo::Fifo ( const string &  pathName  )  [explicit]

Creates a named-pipe.

Parameters:
pathName A path to a non-existing file.

Fifo::~Fifo (  )  [virtual]

Unlinks the associated file to the fifo from the file-system.
